body:
Repeated Measures is MATLAB software for running psychophysics and motor control experiments. It is built on top of the [psychtoolbox](psychtoolbox.org).

It has been tested on OSX and Windows (XP or 7), although many of the devices will only work with Windows.

To install repeated measures, follow [these instructions](instructions.html)

A tutorial on how to use Repeated Measures can be found [here](https://github.com/JasonFriedman/RepeatedMeasures/wiki/Tutorial).
name: Repeated Measures
tagline: MATLAB software for running psychophysics and motor control experiments
